Jaffarkelshak: worked like a charm: how do I switch from gnome to kde?
are you trying to install KDE?
a better way would be installing kubuntu-desktop - that way you'll get a nice kdm/gdm entry to choose from at system startup
if you have kubuntu-desktop package (and dependancies) installed, in kdm or gdm (the login screen - whichever you use) you have the "options" menu, and there - "session type". just choose KDE
